Small Store in React

About this project

This is a small store website. This site is built with React and designed responsive using the mobile-first approach. The responsiveness is implemented only with SASS without any responsive libraries applied. Currently, only the home button, two carousels, and newsletter features are working. React-responsive-carousel and React-multi-carousel are used for the carousels on the main page. Also, Formik and React-mailchimp-subscribe are used to manage a newsletter subscription form, and Yup helps to validate the user input. Footer menus are collapsable when screen size gets smaller. Further implementation of the features such as sign-in, search, shopping cart, and working links are in progress.
